docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: This is the starting page for the hardfoc documentation.

docs.title: About This Documentation
docs.text:
The docs/ directory holds all Markdown files that become the published site. Each sub-folder provides a page on the site, for example:

docs/
  getting-started/
  api/
  porting/
  hardware/

mkdocs.yml at the repository root describes the navigation and theme.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Basic introduction and setup instructions will go here.

docs.title: Porting Guide
docs.text: Instructions for porting the project to new hardware or platforms.
